DOC.brief_summary: Multimodal music therapy ( MT ) child age 8 12 year anxiety disorder compare community treatment usual ( TAU ) . 36 child randomize either MT TAU . Primary outcome presence anxiety disorder end treatment . Secondary outcome self- parent-/teacher report anxiety , co-morbid psychological symptom , quality life . Stability outcome assess six month end treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Multimodal Music Therapy Children With Anxiety Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: Patients enrol community clinic outpatient clinic child adolescent psychiatry/psychotherapy . Inclusion criterion : diagnosis anxiety disorder ( separation anxiety disorder , general anxiety disorder , social phobia , specific phobia , anxiety disorder ) ; age 8-12 ; medication stable medication treatment ; IQ > 80 ; inform consent caregiver inform assent patient . Outcome measure . Kiddie-SADS ; STAIC-C , SPAIC , CDI ; SDQ teacher report ; CBCL 4-18 ; ILK quality life inventory . Assessment time point : pre-intervention ; post-intervention ; 6-months follow-up .
